com.sensorstack.provenancelayer

Class ProvenanceLayer

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.sensorstack.provenancelayer.ProvenanceLayer

  • public class ProvenanceLayer
extends java.lang.Object
    Supports fetching of complete data objects which includes: 1) medical data value from sensors 2) metadata information from sensors 3) GPS location and timestamp from the system

    • Method Detail

      • getTemperature

        public static Temperature getTemperature(Context context,
                         boolean flag,
                         java.lang.String[] variableMetadata,
                         DiscretePacketInfo discretePacketInfo,
                         RangeOfValues<java.lang.Float> range)
                                  throws NoDeviceConnectedException
        Used to fetch Temperature sensor data value along with metadata
        Parameters:
        context - Context of the app
        flag - If set, a new request to re-fetch metadata from the h/w is made otherwise last fetched metadata is used
        variableMetadata - Specifies which additional metadata parameters are needed to be fetched from the sensors other than the mandatory sensorID and manufacturerID
        discretePacketInfo - Required to fetch and unpack the data received. See DiscretePacketInfo
        range - Specifies the valid range of sensor hardware. See RangeOfValues
        Returns:
        Fully populated instance of Temperature class. See Temperature
        Throws:
        NoDeviceConnectedException

      • getBloodPressure

        public static BloodPressure getBloodPressure(Context context,
                             boolean flag,
                             java.lang.String[] variableMetadata,
                             DiscretePacketInfo discretePacketInfo,
                             RangeOfValues<java.lang.Integer> sysRange,
                             RangeOfValues<java.lang.Integer> diasRange)
                                      throws NoDeviceConnectedException
        Used to fetch Blood Pressure sensor data value along with metadata
        Parameters:
        context - Context of the app
        flag - If set, a new request to re-fetch metadata from the h/w is made otherwise last fetched metadata is used
        variableMetadata - Specifies which additional metadata parameters are needed to be fetched from the sensors other than the mandatory sensorID and manufacturerID
        discretePacketInfo - Required to fetch and unpack the data received. See DiscretePacketInfo
        sysRange - Specifies the valid range of sensor hardware for Systolic Pressure. See RangeOfValues
        diasRange - Specifies the valid range of sensor hardware for Diastolic Pressure. See RangeOfValues
        Returns:
        Fully populated instance of BloodPressure class. See BloodPressure
        Throws:
        NoDeviceConnectedException

         DiscretePacketInfo discretePacketInfo,

         RangeOfValues<java.lang.Float> resistanceRange)

        Used to fetch GSR sensor data value along with metadata
        Parameters:
        context - Context of the app
        flag - If set, a new request to re-fetch metadata from the h/w is made otherwise last fetched metadata is used
        variableMetadata - Specifies which additional metadata parameters are needed to be fetched from the sensors other than the mandatory sensorID and manufacturerID
        discretePacketInfo - Required to fetch and unpack the data received. See DiscretePacketInfo
        conductanceRange - Specifies the valid range of sensor hardware for skin conductance. See RangeOfValues
        resistanceRange - Specifies the valid range of sensor hardware for skin resistance. See RangeOfValues

      • getDiscrete

        public static SensorData getDiscrete(Context context,
                     boolean flag,
                     java.lang.String[] variableMetadata,
                     DiscretePacketInfo discretePacketInfo,
                     SensorDataRange range)
                              throws DataNotCollectedException,
                                     NoDeviceConnectedException
        Used to fetch discrete sensor data values along with metadata
        Parameters:
        context - Context of the app
        flag - If set, a new request to re-fetch metadata from the h/w is made otherwise last fetched metadata is used
        variableMetadata - Specifies which additional metadata parameters are needed to be fetched from the sensors other than the mandatory sensorID and manufacturerID
        discretePacketInfo - Required to fetch and unpack the data received. See DiscretePacketInfo
        range - Specifies the valid range of sensors' hardware. See SensorDataRange
        Returns:
        Fully populated instance of GSR class. See GSR
        Throws:
        DataNotCollectedException
        NoDeviceConnectedException
